WorkItem.Description:
Trying to generate a svg image from a WebBrowser control in a PC with IE11, I see an error :
"Value of '0' is not valid for 'emSize'. 'emSize' should be greater than 0 and less than or equal to System.Single.MaxValue"
The same code works with PC that have IE10 installed!

in SvgVisualElementStyle.GetFont(SvgRenderer renderer) I've fixed line 320 with:
```
if (fontSizeUnit == SvgUnit.None || fontSizeUnit == SvgUnit.Empty)
```
and now code works well in both PC.

Comments.Message: the codeplex repo is over 2 years old, please use this fork now: https://github.com/vvvv/SVG
